item.title: API Quick Start
item.description: vacuum has been designed to work as an API from the ground up. This was actually one of the motivators behind the development of the tool. If you’re a golang developer, and you want to lint OpenAPI specs using a library, then look no further. Install vacuum go get github.com/daveshanley/vacuum Lint an OpenAPI Spec This simple quick start code will read in an OpenAPI, generate a RuleSet from the built-in defaults, Then it will apply the rules to the spec, filter the results by a category, and then print them out to the console.
